last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: Donia continues her confessions, revealing that she poisoned Wa'el, and when Selim sent her a video of what she did, she lured him to the villa to kill him. Donia is sentenced to death. Hassan gets released. Yehia overdoses.

name: When We Were Young
overview: A thriller about five friends who, after their graduation from the AUC, start working for Professor Selim Mansour, who is involved in illegal activities. But in the wake of a murder, everything changes.
